table.name: invoice_stop_seal
table.description: INVOICE_STOP_SEAL contains the serial number of the security device that relates to the stop.

columns.name: STOP_SEQ_NO
columns.description: The stop number for which the seal was applied.

columns.name: SEAL_SEQUENCE
columns.description: A one-up number to allow several seals being placed on a piece of equipment at the same stop.

columns.name: SEAL_NUMBER
columns.description: The number of the seal that was placed on the piece of equipment.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
